mapper.insert: insert into cms_user_account (account_id, account_name, account_password, login_date, login_ip, login_type, login_web_header, user_id) values (#{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginWebHeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update cms_user_account set account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_password = #{accountPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_date = #{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, login_ip = #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_type = #{loginType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_web_header = #{loginWebHeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select account_id, account_name, account_password, login_date, login_ip, login_type, login_web_header, user_id from cms_user_account where account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select account_id, account_name, account_password, login_date, login_ip, login_type, login_web_header, user_id from cms_user_account
select * from cms_user_account where account_name=#{accountName} and account_password=#{accountPassword}
